title: Fennica in Finna
text: can use functions provided visualize data search specific fields like author information, publication details, call numbers using search_finna, can use Finna’s field-specific search filters. Finna allows search different fields specifying type parameter adding filters. ’s can modify search_finna function query fields:
code: library(finna) fennica <- search_finna("*",filters = c('collection:"FEN"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[1809 TO 1918]"')) refined_data <- refine_metadata(fennica) fennica <- search_finna("*",filters = c('collection:"FEN"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[1809 TO 1918]"')) refined_data <- refine_metadata(fennica)

title: Fennica in Finna
text: want search publication information publication date publisher, can use type = "Title" type = "AllFields" apply filters: specific years, can use search_daterange_mv filter: search publisher, can add filter publisher name:
code: search_finna(query = "Sibelius", filters = c('search_daterange_mv:"[2000 TO 2020]"')) search_finna(query = "Sibelius", filters = c('publisher:"Ondine"'))

title: Fennica in Finna
text: Call numbers used classify items libraries. search call number, can add filter callnumber-search callnumber: return results call number 78.54 (typically used orchestral music).
code: search_finna(query = "Sibelius", filters = c('callnumber-search:"78.54"'))

title: Fennica in Finna
text: can combine search types filters make complex queries. instance, search works Jean Sibelius published 2000 2020 call number 78.54:
code: search_finna(   query = "Sibelius",   filters = c('author:"Jean Sibelius"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[2000 TO 2020]"', 'callnumber-search:"78.54"') )

title: Fennica in Finna
code: # Author search example search_finna(query = "Jean Sibelius", type = "Author")  # Search for works by author with publication date range search_finna(query = "Jean Sibelius", filters = c('search_daterange_mv:"[2000 TO 2020]"'))  # Search for works by call number search_finna(query = "Sibelius", filters = c('callnumber-search:"78.54"'))  # Combine author, publication date, and call number filters search_finna(   query = "Sibelius",   filters = c('author:"Jean Sibelius"', 'search_daterange_mv:"[2000 TO 2020]"', 'callnumber-search:"78.54"') )

title: Fennica in Finna
text: Filters: filters need match exact field names used Finna’s API. can find field names API documentation looking response API . Call Number Search: Ensure call numbers correctly formatted according library’s classification system (e.g., YKL Finland). way, can extract specific metadata like authors, publication years, call numbers using search_finna function.

title: Refine, integrate and analyse Finna metadata
text: purpose refine_metadata() function : Ensure completeness filling missing values placeholder text. Standardize key metadata fields easier analysis. Select relevant fields, simplifying dataset. refinement process makes metadata consistent user-friendly, reducing potential issues subsequent analysis reporting.
code: library(finna) library(ggplot2) sibelius_data <- search_finna("sibelius") refined_data <- refine_metadata(sibelius_data) print(refined_data) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Sibelius favourites : … Sibel… 2001  Unknown… Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … Unkno… ##  2 Sibelius                Tappe… 1967  Unknown… Taidet… Unknown… Jyväsk… Unkno… ##  3 Sibelius                Favén… Unkn… Unknown… Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… Unkno… ##  4 Sibelius                Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… Unkno… ##  5 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… Unkno… ##  6 SIBELIUS                TÖRNE… 1945  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIU… Helle-… Unkno… ##  7 Sibelius                Lampi… 1995  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… Unkno… ##  8 Sibelius                Lampi… 2005  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… Unkno… ##  9 Sibelius                Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… Unkno… ## 10 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… Unkno… ## # ℹ 90 more rows

title: Refine, integrate and analyse Finna metadata
text: integrate two datasets using full_join() dplyr, can write code directly like :
code: library(dplyr)  # Example Finna metadata (metadata1) finna_data <- search_finna("sibelius",limit = 4)  # Example other dataset to merge with (metadata2) other_data <- tibble::tibble(   Title = c("Sibelius Symphony No. 5", "Finlandia", "Valse Triste"),   Rating = c(5, 4, 3) )  # Integrate the two datasets using full_join by the "Title" column integrated_data <- full_join(finna_data, other_data, by = "Title")  # Print the integrated dataset print(integrated_data) ## # A tibble: 7 × 11 ##   id    Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series last_indexed ##   <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>        ## 1 lapi… Sibe… Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA     NA           ## 2 jtm.… Sibe… Tappe… 1967  NA       Taidet… NA       Jyväsk… NA     NA           ## 3 lahd… Sibe… Favén… NA    NA       Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… NA     NA           ## 4 ande… Sibe… Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA     NA           ## 5 NA    Sibe… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA     NA           ## 6 NA    Finl… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA     NA           ## 7 NA    Vals… NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA     NA           ## # ℹ 1 more variable: Rating <dbl>

title: Introduction to finna
text: Finna Finnish national search service provides access collections Finnish museums, libraries, archives. maintained National Library Finland collaboration cultural scientific institutions. Finna allows users search explore wide range resources, including books, images, maps, artifacts, digital content various institutions across Finland. vignette provides overview use finna package. make simple search use following code. N.B search_finna() default limit 100 records used. Specify ‘limit’ argument records.
code: library(finna) record <- search_finna("sibelius") print(record) ## # A tibble: 100 × 10 ##    id                Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>             <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 lapinkirjasto.15… Sibe… Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA     ##  2 jtm.158774447824… Sibe… Tappe… 1967  NA       Taidet… NA       Jyväsk… NA     ##  3 lahdenmuseo.lkm-… Sibe… Favén… NA    NA       Taidet… kaljuus… Lahden… NA     ##  4 anders.198790     Sibe… Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA     ##  5 eepos.136605      Sibe… Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Eepos-… NA     ##  6 helle.110797      SIBE… TÖRNE… 1945  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIU… Helle-… NA     ##  7 arto.000815990    Sibe… Lampi… 1995  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ##  8 arto.000959673    Sibe… Lampi… 2005  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ##  9 arto.005290105    Sibe… Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ## 10 arto.005369813    Sibe… Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: last_indexed <chr>

title: Introduction to finna
text: addition common Boolean operators (, , ), Finna uses + !- operators.

title: Introduction to finna
text: + sign indicates search term must found every search result. example, looking material must feature economics may also feature Keynes:
code: library(finna) search_oper <- search_finna("+economics Keynes”)") print(search_oper) ## # A tibble: 100 × 10 ##    id                Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>             <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 uef.998588837059… Keyn… Lawso… 1985  eng      Kirja,… NA       Itä-Su… NA     ##  2 abo.991952734059… Keyn… Lawso… 1989  eng      Kirja,… NA       Åbo Ak… NA     ##  3 hanna.29001       The … Harri… 1947  eng      Kirja,… Keynes.… Svensk… NA     ##  4 vaari.337847      The … Harri… 1950  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  5 tuni.99329737420… The … Harri… 1950  eng      Kirja,… Keynes,… Tamper… NA     ##  6 ekk.991689954006… The … Harri… 1949  eng      Kirja,… keynesi… Edusku… NA     ##  7 vaari.113512      The … Harri… 1949  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  8 fikka.567288      The … Harri… 1948  eng      Kirja,… Keynes,… Kansal… NA     ##  9 utu.991459665540… The … Harri… 1968  eng      Kirja,… NA       Turun … NA     ## 10 vaari.1080451     The … Harri… 1965  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: last_indexed <chr>

title: Introduction to finna
text: symbols !- remove search results feature search term following operator !-. example, want find material feature term economics term Keynes:
code: library(finna) search_oper <- search_finna("economics !-Keynes”)") print(search_oper) ## # A tibble: 100 × 10 ##    id                Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>             <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 cute.27720        New … Londo… 1997  eng      Kirja,… taiteen… Tekijä… ACE r… ##  2 aalto.9957447744… Econ… Manki… 2011  eng      Kirja,… kansant… Aalto-… NA     ##  3 3amk.268257       Econ… Acemo… 2016  eng      Kirja,… Economi… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  4 helka.9919197893… Econ… Parki… 2005  eng      Kirja,… Economi… Helka-… NA     ##  5 3amk.271130       Econ… Acemo… 2019  eng      Kirja,… Economi… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  6 3amk.271263       Econ… Parki… 2019  eng      Kirja,… Economi… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  7 vanaicat.109930   Econ… Hubba… 2010  eng      Kirja,… Economi… HAMK, … NA     ##  8 aalto.9998411761… Econ… Parki… 2003  eng      Kirja,… Economi… Aalto-… NA     ##  9 3amk.95963        Econ… Stigl… 2000  eng      Kirja,… kansant… 3AMK-k… NA     ## 10 tuni.99370035305… Econ… Lipse… 1975  eng      Kirja,… Economi… Tamper… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows ## # ℹ 1 more variable: last_indexed <chr>

title: Introduction to finna
text: Fuzzy search also yield results feature words similar search term. search operator ~ perform fuzzy search used final character single-word search. example, fuzzy search word roam also return results words foam roams.
code: fuzzy_search <- search_finna("roam~") print(fuzzy_search) ## NULL

previous_headings: Introduction > Search phrase examples > Fine-tuning your search

title: Viola in Finna
text: fetch_viola_records function allows batch processing data Viola collection Finna, across multiple year ranges, handles records without date information.

previous_headings: Viola Collection in Finna > Example Usage
title: Viola in Finna
text: following example fetches data Viola collection year ranges: 0–1699, 1700–1799, 1800–1899.
code: library(finna)  # Fetch records results <- fetch_viola_records(   base_query = "*",   base_filters = c('collection:"VIO"'), # Filters for the Viola collection   year_ranges = list(c(0,1699),c(1700,1799),c(1800,1899)),           # Year ranges to query   include_na = TRUE,                   # Include records with missing dates   limit_per_query = 100000,              # Maximum records per query   total_limit = Inf,                 # Overall record limit   delay_after_query = 3                # Delay between API calls   )  # View the number of records fetched print(nrow(results)) ## [1] 3478 head(results) ## # A tibble: 6 × 10 ##   id    Title Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series last_indexed ##   <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  <chr>        ## 1 fikk… Demo  NA     NA    zxx      Äänite… NA       Kansal… NA     NA           ## 2 fikk… Een … Palm,… 1678  swe      Nuotti  1678; t… Kansal… NA     NA           ## 3 fikk… [Ant… NA     1608  lat      Nuotti  arkisto… Kansal… NA     NA           ## 4 fikk… [Zac… NA     1676  swe      Nuotti  Collian… Kansal… NA     NA           ## 5 fikk… [Gra… NA     1616  fin      Nuotti  arkisto… Kansal… NA     NA           ## 6 fikk… [Kor… NA     1679  lat      Nuotti  arkisto… Kansal… NA     NA

what: Title: R Package for Finna API
title: Title: R Package for Finna API
text: finna package provides tools access analyze metadata Finna API, aggregates content Finnish archives, libraries, museums.

title: Title: R Package for Finna API
text: Install released version CRAN: devel version finna can installed GitHub follows:
code: install.packages("finna") # Install finna if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("finna", quietly = TRUE)) {   remotes::install_github("rOpenGov/finna") } remotes::install_github("rOpenGov/finna")

what: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
title: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
text: function harvests metadata records OAI-PMH-compliant server batches, using custom User-Agent string identify service returns tibble format.

title: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
code: harvest_oai_pmh(   base_url,   metadata_prefix,   set = NULL,   verbose = TRUE,   user_agent = "FinnaHarvester/1.0",   output_file = NULL,   record_limit = NULL )

title: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
text: base_url string. base URL OAI-PMH server. metadata_prefix string. metadata format request (e.g., "oai_dc", "marc21"). set string. Optional. set specifier limit harvested records (e.g., "non_dedup"). verbose logical. Whether display progress messages. Default TRUE. user_agent string. custom User-Agent string identify service. Default "FinnaHarvester/1.0". output_file output file saved csv file. record_limit limits number records user wants fetch

title: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
text: tibble harvested records containing selected metadata fields.

title: Harvest Metadata from an OAI-PMH Server — harvest_oai_pmh
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{  # Example for oai_dc (Dublin Core) records_oai_dc <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_dc", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" ) # Example for marc21 (MARC 21) records_marc21 <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "marc21", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" )  # Example for oai_vufind_json (VuFind JSON) records_oai_vufind_json <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_vufind_json", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" )  # Example for oai_ead (Encoded Archival Description) records_oai_ead <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_ead", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" ) # Example for oai_ead3 (Encoded Archival Description version 3) records_oai_ead3 <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_ead3", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" )  # Example for oai_forward (Forward metadata format) records_oai_forward <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_forward", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" )  # Example for oai_lido (Lightweight Information Describing Objects) records_oai_lido <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_lido", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" )  # Example for oai_qdc (Qualified Dublin Core) records_oai_qdc <- harvest_oai_pmh( base_url = "https://api.finna.fi/OAI/Server", metadata_prefix = "oai_qdc", user_agent = "MyCustomHarvester/1.0" ) } # }

what: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: function retrieves records Finna index option limit total number records returned. function paginates results, fetching records specified total limit reached.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
code: search_finna(   query = NULL,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: query description type string specifying type search. Options include "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject". Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields returned search results. Defaults NULL, returns standard set fields. filters vector filter queries refine search. Defaults NULL. facets vector specifying facets return results. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector regular expressions filter facets. Defaults NULL. sort string defining sort order results. Options include: "relevance,id asc" (default) "main_date_str desc" (Year, newest first) "main_date_str asc" (Year, oldest first) "last_indexed desc" (Last modified) "first_indexed desc" (Last added) "callnumber,id asc" (Classmark) "author,id asc" (Author) "title,id asc" (Title) limit integer specifying total number records return across multiple pages. lng string language returned translated strings. Options "fi" - Finnish, "en-gb" - English, "sv" - Swedish, "se" - Sami. Defaults "fi" - Finnish. prettyPrint logical value indicating whether pretty-print JSON response. Useful debugging. Defaults FALSE.

title: Finna Index Search with Total Limit Option — search_finna
text: tibble containing search results relevant fields extracted provenance information.
